artist: Engraver: Baccio Baldini; Artist: After Alessandro di Mariano Botticelli
description: Poets shown twice in a rocky landscape; on the left in converstaion; in center looking at a vision of Beatrice in the sky; hill on right with inscription PER ME
inscription:
Inscription

in plate in brown upper left corner: [III]; on rock upper right: [PER ME]; below image in pencil: [1-166]; on mat in pencil: [Baldini, engraver see Hind   MIA has]; on verso in pencil: [Sandro Boticelli]
title: Dante and Virgil with the Vision of Beatrice
